title: My game window is super tiny!

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I uninstalled Windows SDK and Visual Studio from my laptop, now the LoL game screen is really tiny.

I reinstalled LoL and then installed Visual Studio 2017 to see if it would fix the issue, but nothing has changed.

The picture above is what I see. The box in the middle is my LoL game screen.
.
.
.
.
.

SOLVED.

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
and delete game.cfg
